metadata.creator: Office of the President
metadata.description: This volume, "Bread and Dignity" attempts to clarify the approach used by Pres. Aquino in providing financial assistance to needy Filipinos. Also, this volume contains the dole-out approach where the President had specifically directed that any form of financial assistance must be seen as an investment rather than plain aid.
metadata.subject: Corazon C. Aquino
metadata.title: The Aquino Management Of The Presidency Bread And Dignity
